hero.title: Medik8 Facial Peel in London
hero.subtitle: Achieve Flawless, Clinic-Level Results
hero.description: Reveal brighter, clearer, smoother skin with a Medik8 peel at Beyond MediSpa Knightsbridge. Our medical-grade peels combine precisely balanced acids with comfort-focused Time Release technology to tackle dullness, congestion, pigmentation, and fine lines. Medik8 peels are ideal for first-time clients and seasoned skincare enthusiasts alike. Expect refined texture, even tone, and a refreshed glow—delivered by trained professionals in Harvey Nichols, Knightsbridge.

treatmentInfo.duration: 30–45 minutes including consultation, application, and aftercare
treatmentInfo.results: Smoother, brighter skin from the very first appointment, with cumulative benefits over a course
